price: Suka ce: "Tallahi! Lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, kun sani, ba mu zodon mu yi ɓarna a cikin ƙasa ba, kuma ba mu kasance ɓarãyi ba."
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتُم مَّا جِئۡنَا لِنُفۡسِدَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كُنَّا سَٰرِقِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi laqad ʿalim'tum mā ji'nā linuf'sida fī al-arḍi wamā kunnā sāriqīna
